mapper.select: select prdt_genre, prdt_name, (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 as "prdt_percent", prdt_currenttotal, (prdt_enddate-prdt_opendate) as "prdt_dday", row_number() over(order by (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 desc, prdt_id desc) from tb_product where prdt_opendate <= current_date and current_date <= prdt_enddate limit 6

select prdt_genre, prdt_name, (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 as "prdt_percent", prdt_currenttotal, (prdt_enddate-prdt_opendate) as "prdt_dday", prdt_opendate, row_number() over(order by prdt_opendate desc, prdt_id desc) from tb_product whereprdt_opendate <= current_date and current_date <= prdt_enddate limit 6
select prdt_genre, prdt_name, prdt_opendate, (prdt_opendate - current_date) as "prdt_comingday" from tb_product where prdt_opendate > current_date order by prdt_comingday, prdt_id desc limit 6;
